original_text: The people of Jericho had shut the gates of their city to make it safe. No one could go in or out of the city.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손들로 말미암아 여리고는 굳게 닫혔고 출입하는 자가 없더라

sentences.original_text: The people of Jericho had shut the gates of their city
No one could go in or out of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 도시로 들어가거나 나갈 수 없었다
